sentences: Eks ma ikka tule, kui vähegi võimalik.
Kena poiss," kiitis Rudolf. "Eks ole," kinnitas Irma.
context: The word 'proovin' is the first person singular present form of the Estonian verb 'proovima', which means 'to try'. It appears in contexts where someone is expressing willingness or intention to attempt something. In this specific case, 'eks ma proovi(n)' is an emphatic construction using 'eks' as a discourse marker that adds emphasis or confirmation to the statement 'I will try'. The combination suggests a confident assertion of trying something.
